Class NamCap

java.lang.Object
NamCap
public class NamCap extends Object
naM-caP is the main antagonist of the game, whose goal is to eat kiwis to gain the ability to hunt the player down.
Author:
Brianna, Desiree, Jenna

  • Constructor Details

    • NamCap

      public NamCap​(processing.core.PImage img, int x, int y)
      Constructs the character naM-caP.
      Parameters:
      img - The image for naM-caP.
      x - The x-coordinate of naM-caP.
      y - The y-coordinate of naM-caP.

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw​(processing.core.PApplet g)
      Draws naM-caP.
      Parameters:
      g - The PApplet used to draw.

    • act

      public void act​(Map grid, Player player)
      If naM-caP eats a kiwi, for the next 5 seconds, naM-caP will try to hunt the player. Otherwise, naM-caP will try and travel to the nearest kiwi.
      Parameters:
      grid - The Map naM-caP is on.
      player - The Player on the grid.

    • setLocation

      public void setLocation​(int x, int y)
      Sets the location of naM-caP to a certain coordinate.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the location.
      y - The y-coordinate of the location.

    • getX

      public int getX()
      Returns:
      The x value of naM-caP's location.

    • getY

      public int getY()
      Returns:
      The y value of naM-caP's location.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets naM-caP to its initial position and direction.

    • hasEatenKiwi

      public boolean hasEatenKiwi()
      Returns:
      true if naM-caP has eaten a kiwi, false if not.

    • eatFruit

      public void eatFruit​(Fruit f)
      Eats the Fruit and gains a special ability depending on the Fruit.
      Parameters:
      f - The Fruit eaten.

    • setKiwiFalse

      public void setKiwiFalse()
      Changes hasKiwi to false

    • atSameLocation

      public boolean atSameLocation​(Fruit f)
      Determines if the Fruit and naM-caP are at the same spot.
      Parameters:
      f - The Fruit.
      Returns:
      true if at same location, false if not.

    • getKiwiPath

      public Coordinate getKiwiPath​(int x, int y, Map grid, Player player)
      Uses BFS to find a Kiwi on the map.
      Parameters:
      x - The starting x position on the grid.
      y - The starting y position on the grid.
      grid - The Map.
      player - The Player.
      Returns:
      A Coordinate of the Kiwi's location with parent Coordinates that form a path.

    • getPlayerPath

      public Coordinate getPlayerPath​(int x, int y, Map grid, Player player)
      Uses BFS to find the Player on the Map.
      Parameters:
      x - The starting x position on the grid.
      y - The starting y position on the grid.
      grid - The Map.
      player - The Player.
      Returns:
      A Coordinate of the Player's location with parent Coordinates that form a path.

    • isFree

      public boolean isFree​(int x, int y, Map grid, Player player)
      Parameters:
      x - The row number of the starting position.
      y - The column number of the starting position
      grid - The Map.
      player - The Player.
      Returns:
      true if the location is in the boundaries of the Map and it contains either a path, or strawberry.

    • isFree2

      public boolean isFree2​(int x, int y, Map grid, Player player)
      Parameters:
      x - The row number of the starting position.
      y - The column number of the starting position
      grid - The Map.
      player - The Player.
      Returns:
      true if the location is in the boundaries of the Map and it contains either a path, strawberry, or Player.
